name: SBv4-crash-study
description: Study comparing the crash rates of versions 2 and 4 of Safe Browsing in preparation for the roll-out to all users in 56

scripts.watch: onchange 'addon/**' 'package.json' 'template/**' -e addon/install.rdf -e addon/chrome.manifest -e addon/StudyUtils.jsm -- npm run build -- '{{event}} {{changed}} $(date)'

author: Kamyar Ardekani <kardekani@mozilla.com>

addon.name: SBv4 crash study
addon.creator: Kamyar Ardekani <kardekani@mozilla.com>
addon.description: Study comparing the crash rates of versions 2 and 4 of Safe Browsing in preparation for the roll-out to all users in 56
